Question: Ledlink Optics,Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ledlink Optics, Inc.

Product Highlight:

- Waterproof lens
- Product models: LL01CI-EHV××L191-M2, LL01ZZ-DTR××L02-M2, LL01ZZ-DUV××L02-M2, LL01ZZ-DUU××L02-M2, LL01ZZ-DRX××L06-M2, LL01ZZ-DRY××L06-M2, LL01ZZ-DRZ××L06-M2, LL03ZZ-CRO××L06, LL01NI-CRO××L06, LL01CR-DKW××L02, LL01CR-DAW××L02
- Applications: Automotive, Architectural, Landscape, Commercial, Street, Industrial, Color Mixing, Indoor

Ledlink Optics specializes in optimizing lighting for various applications such as automotive, architectural, landscape, commercial, street, industrial, color mixing, and indoor. Their products include a range of waterproof lenses suitable for different lighting needs.
Summary_cn:
Ledlink Optics公司。

產品亮點：

- 防水鏡片
- 產品型號：LL01CI-EHV××L191-M2、LL01ZZ-DTR××L02-M2、LL01ZZ-DUV××L02-M2、LL01ZZ-DUU××L02-M2、LL01ZZ-DRX××L06-M2、LL01ZZ-DRY××L06-M2、LL01ZZ-DRZ××L06-M2、LL03ZZ-CRO××L06、LL01NI-CRO××L06、LL01CR-DKW××L02、LL01CR-DAW××L02
- 應用領域：汽車、建築、景觀、商業、街道、工業、色彩混合、室內

Ledlink Optics專注於優化各種應用場景的照明，包括汽車、建築、景觀、商業、街道、工業、色彩混合和室內。他們的產品包括一系列防水鏡片，適合不同照明需求。
